articles.title: Can bringing back manufacturing help the heartland catch up with 'superstar' cities? : Planet Money - NPR
articles.description: In recent decades, America has seen economic opportunities concentrated in superstar cities. Manufacturing boosters hope reshoring factories could help change that. We look at the theory and evidence.
articles.content:
This is Part 3 in our Planet Money newsletter series on manufacturing in America. Part 1
 asked why Americans aren't filling the manufacturing jobs that are already here. Part 2

articles.title: Raw recap & reactions: Random Monday in June - Cageside Seats
articles.description: Stephanie Vaquer’s debut, El Grande Americano’s surprise win, and Seth Rollins’ group does things on this week’s Monday Night Raw.
